name: Gin Rummy Stars - Card Game
description:
This fun & exciting Gin Rummy game is the classic knock card game you know and love, brought to you in a riveting free online multiplayer game!

If you love games like Euchre, Cribbage, Carioca and others, then you’ll love to play Rummy Stars! Play for free with your friends or challenge other players online.

Do you have what it takes to become the champion? Play Rummy Stars to test your Gin Rummy skills with this classic online card game!



If you're looking for some online fun, you've come to the right game! Play Rummy Stars today!

FEATURES:
« Enjoy a competitive Gin Rummy experience with live players worldwide!
« Competitive Leaderboards
« HD Graphics and a Slick Design
« Free Coin Bonuses Hourly & Daily!
« Exciting Game Progression, Access New Features as you Level Up!
« Unlock Challenging Achievements
« Extensive Game Statistics to Keep Track of Your Performance
« Facebook Connect Bonus
« Unique Avatars

Rummy Stars is brought to you by the creators of leading online multiplayer social games.


Like us on Facebook for FREE COIN OFFERS! https://apps.facebook.com/rummy-stars/


This game is intended for adults and does not offer real money gambling or any opportunities to win real money or prizes. Success within this game does not imply future success at real money.
